name: Guitar Lessons
description:
£25.00 - On Sale

I am RGT registered guitar tutor offering lessons from £25 an hour from my home studio. (close to Bookham train station) – see map for location. 
I have almost 10 years teaching experience, tutoring pupils from ages 5 years to 70 years in both large groups & one to one tuition. I teach a mixture of the RGT & Rock School syllabus (for which some pupils enjoy the focus of working towards a graded exam, although not everybody does) & a selection of songs that my pupils would like to play from their favourite band, youtube video or album. All in all, it is a great idea to work towards a specific goal- whether this is a graded exam, or simply that you are now able to play the solo from your favourite song! 

Prices 
£25 for 1 hour lesson / £20 for 45 minutes lesson / £15 for 30 minute lesson
